Package edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.pam.tasks

Interface Summary
DetectionAlgorithm A process which detects a pattern (feature) in SensoryMemory content and excites PamNodes representing that pattern.
 

Class Summary
AddToPerceptTask A task to add a PamNode, PamLink, or NodeStructure to the percept.
AddToPerceptTaskTest  
BasicDetectionAlgorithm This class implements the FeatureDetector interface and provides default methods.
ExcitationTask A task that allows PAM nodes to be excited asynchronously.
ExcitationTaskTest  
MultipleDetectionAlgorithm This class implements the FeatureDetector interface and provides default methods.
PropagationTask A propagation task excites a node and a link.
PropagationTaskTest A propagation task excites a node and a link.
